complaint_text: I was charged a hidden fee and the salesperson did not explain the product properly.
There were fees I did not know about when I took this loan.
The marketing was misleading and there were hidden charges that affected my balance.
General service issue, no serious conduct problem.
Agent was very pushy and called many times to pressure me to sign up.
I was misled about the interest rate and later discovered extra fees.
Hidden fees and an unauthorised transaction appeared on my credit card statement.
Product was okay but not clearly explained.
Salesperson used aggressive language and I felt pressured to take the loan.
I noticed hidden fees and an unauthorised transaction deduction this month.
